metadata.title: CVE-2016-3924 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: services/audioflinger/Effects.cpp in mediaserver in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and7.0 before 2016-10-01 does not validate EFFECT_CMD_SET_PARAM andEFFECT_CMD_SET_PARAM_DEFERRED commands, which allows attackers to obtainsensitive information via a crafted application, aka internal bug 30204301.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
